decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge only of Condition 4 Part i (b) (Contaminated Land - which relates to the pre-commencement part of the development) attached to planning permission ref. 77079/APP/2022/534. Further details related to 4i (a) and 4ii - iv of the approved planning application are required in order to fully discharge the condition.
description: Details pursuant to the part discharge of Condition 4 (part (i)(b) (pre-construction) (Contaminated Land Remediation Scheme) of planning permission ref. 77079/APP/2022/534, dated 16-05-2022 (Demolition of the existing Scout Huts and erection of a new Scout Hut)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
